content: this beautiful crochet scarf made with cross-over cable stitches is worked lengthwise in row back and forth a picture tutorial is provided for visual crocheters update 12 22 2023 the matching wheat hat 8 pattern is now available so you can make a lovely crochet set **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 2 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 3 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 4 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 check out my youtube channel 7 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wheat-hat-3 2 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 3 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 4 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 5 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 7 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog
